title: Watch: Key moments in Trump's 'Liberation Day' tariffs announcement
description: The US president said universal 10% tariffs would go into effect for all countries starting 5 April.
excerpt: The US president said universal 10% tariffs would go into effect for all countries starting 5 April.
text: Watch: Key moments in Trump's 'Liberation Day' tariffs announcementUS President Donald Trump has announced a universal "baseline" 10% tariff on all imports into the US, on what he has dubbed "Liberation Day".Trump also unveiled a 10% tariff on UK goods and 20% on EU goods in a watershed moment for global trade. html:
Watch: Key moments in Trump's 'Liberation Day' tariffs announcement

US President Donald Trump has announced a universal "baseline" 10% tariff on all imports into the US, on what he has dubbed "Liberation Day".

Trump also unveiled a 10% tariff on UK goods and 20% on EU goods in a watershed moment for global trade. The US will also hit certain countries with much steeper tariffs, as high as 50%.

4 hours ago

Trump tariffs

Donald Trump

United States

'It's weird' - Nasa's Butch and Suni adapt to life back on Earth

The duo's eight-day mission became a nine-month space odyssey after their Boeing Starliner had technical problems.

2 days ago

US & Canada

Ice-coated trees and infrastructure caused hazardous conditions and left over 350,000 Canadians without power.

US & Canada

The country's new Prime Minister Mark Carney has called for a national election on 28 April.
